item.name: SMTP_SERVER
item.description: The url of the server, for example smtp.gmail.com or smtp.gmx.com

item.name: SMTP_PORT
item.error: SMTP Server port must be defined
item.description: The port on which the smtp will establish connection to the server (default 25)

item.name: SMTP_DOMAIN
item.error: SMTP Server domain must be defined
item.description: The domain of the smtp server, for example the domain of smtp.gmail.com is gmail.com

item.name: SMTP_USERNAME
item.error: The user for the SMTP account must be specified
item.description: The username of the account from which emails will be sent

item.name: SMTP_PASSWORD
item.error: The password for the SMTP account must be specified
item.description: The password of the account from which emails will be sent

item.name: SMTP_RECIPIENT
item.error: The kindle email recipient must be specified
item.description: The kindle email which will receive articles
